bibl.title: The Town of Syene. Report on the 5th and 6th Season in Aswan. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Mitteilungen des Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts. Abteilung Kairo
MDIK

bibl.note: Joint mission of the Swiss Institute of Architectural and Archaeological Research Cairo and the Inspectorate of Aswan of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, 2004-2006. - See in part. pp. 314-338: W.M., IV. Excavations in the town centre from the Late Period to Late Roman times (Area 15); - 338-344: F.M.A. and W.M., V. Roman cemetery and Islamic suburb north of the ancient town (Areas 21, 24, 25); - 344: C.v.P., VI. A pier of the 7th century AD (Area 20); - 344-351: S.M.-K., VII. The pottery assemblage of a cellar in House 2 / Area 13 (1st century AD); - 351-D.K.: 356, VIII. Class finds from the fill of cellar 4-13-45.
